title: Perform Failure Mode and Effects Analysis (FMEA)
description: An engineer is leading an FMEA session for a new piece of heavy machinery to proactively identify and mitigate potential failure modes.

tasks.description: Identify all major components of the machinery.
tasks.expected_outcome: The team lists all key components like the engine, transmission, and hydraulic pump.

tasks.description: For each component, brainstorm potential failure modes (e.g., 'Engine overheats').
tasks.expected_outcome: The team identifies multiple potential failures for each component.

tasks.description: For each failure mode, assess its severity, occurrence, and detection to calculate a Risk Priority Number (RPN) and identify the highest-risk items to address.
tasks.expected_outcome: The team calculates the RPN for all failure modes and identifies the top 3 risks to focus on for mitigation.
